patientInfo.name: John Doe
patientInfo.disclaimer: This  for informational purposes only and should not be used as a substitute for professional medical advice.

content.introduction:
To,

The Principal

Stella Maris Convent High School

Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh

Subject:  Application for two days of Sick leave due to Viral fever.

Respected Sir/Madam,

With due respect, I would like to notify you that I have been suffering from viral fever since last night. As per the advice of the physician, I have been advised to take complete bed rest for at least two days.

So Sir/Madam, I request you to grant me leave for two days, that is, from(Date/Month/Year) to(Date/Month/Year). I will be highly obliged for your kindness.

 

Thanking You

Yours faithfully

Rupali Pandey

dynamicDietFieldDefinitions.label: Carbohydrate Sensitivity
dynamicDietFieldDefinitions.highRecommendation: Reduce carbohydrate intake, focus on complex carbs.

dynamicDietFieldDefinitions.label: Fat Sensitivity
dynamicDietFieldDefinitions.highRecommendation: Reduce saturated and trans fats; focus on healthy fats.

dynamicDietFieldDefinitions.label: Protein Requirement
dynamicDietFieldDefinitions.lowRecommendation: Consider increasing protein intake for muscle maintenance.

dynamicDietFieldDefinitions.label: Alcohol Sensitivity
dynamicDietFieldDefinitions.highRecommendation: Limit alcohol consumption due to genetic sensitivity.

dynamicDietFieldDefinitions.label: Caffeine Sensitivity
dynamicDietFieldDefinitions.highRecommendation: Limit caffeine intake due to slow metabolism.
dynamicDietFieldDefinitions.normalRecommendation: Normal caffeine metabolism; moderate intake is fine.
dynamicDietFieldDefinitions.lowRecommendation: Fast caffeine metabolism; higher intake may be tolerated.

recommendations.HIGH: Reduce carbohydrate intake, focus on complex carbs.
Reduce saturated and trans fats; focus on healthy fats.

endurancePotential.description: Excellent genetic predisposition for endurance activities

exerciseTime.level: Evening time is more beneficial than morning

fatigueResistance.level: Normal fatigue resistance. Average endurance capacity

bloodFlow.level: Reduced vascular efficiency, affects endurance sports.

oxygenEfficiency.level: Normal VO2 Max. Need practice to excel in endurance sports

waterLoss.level: Increased water and electrolyte loss tendency. Focus on Hydration and electrolyte management during sports/events

lactateClearing.level: High lactate clearance. Beneficial for Endurance sports.

recoveryEfficiency.level: High recovery efficiency. Enhanced sports potential & reduced injury risk

bodyComposition.level: Low fat accumulation. Increased muscle tendency.

injuryRisk.level: High injury tendency. Thorough injury management steps to be taken.

achillesTendonInjury.level: Low injury tendency. Ensure adequate warmup before exercises

ligamentInjury.level: Low ACL injury tendency. Ensure adequate warmup before exercises

rupture.level: Low rupture tendency. Ensure adequate warmup before exercises

muscleCramps.level: Low risk of muscle cramps. Ensure adequate warmup before exercises

detoxification.advice: Support liver health with cruciferous vegetables.

vitaminDMetabolism.advice: Ensure adequate Vitamin D intake and sun exposure.

lipidMetabolism.advice: Monitor lipid levels and follow a heart-healthy diet.

insulinResistance.advice: Focus on low glycemic index foods and regular exercise.

circadianRhythm.advice: Maintain consistent sleep schedule and optimize sleep environment.

exerciseResponsiveness.impact: Enhanced power and strength response to training
exerciseResponsiveness.advice: Incorporate strength and power training into routine.

snackingTendency.impact: Increased tendency for snacking and higher BMI
snackingTendency.advice: Practice mindful eating and portion control.

powerVsEndurance.advice: Vary training to include both power and endurance exercises.

injuryRecovery.impact: Slower collagen repair, increased injury risk
injuryRecovery.advice: Focus on adequate protein and Vitamin C for tissue repair.

fluidLossTendency.impact: Increased fluid and electrolyte loss during exercise
fluidLossTendency.advice: Ensure proper hydration and electrolyte replenishment.

vo2Max.advice: Optimize cardiovascular training for peak performance.

celiacDiseaseTendency.description: Low genetic risk for celiac disease

impactOnBonesJoints.description: Digestive health does not affect bone health

alcoholAddiction.description: Low genetic predisposition to alcohol dependency

altruism.description: Strong genetic predisposition toward helping others

sleepCycle.intervention: EXERCISE IN THE EVENING AVOID CARBS DURING BREAKFAST

sleepApnea.intervention: EXERCISE REGULARLY SEEK MEDICAL ADVICE IF ISSUE PERSISTS

sleepDepth.intervention: CONSUME CURD RICE IN DINNER FOR BETTER SLEEP

stressSensitivity.intervention: EXERCISE REGULARLY FOR A BETTER SLEEP CYCLE

allergiesAndSensitivity.generalAdvice: THE BEST WAY TO REDUCE ALLERGIES IS TO STAY AWAY FROM THE SOURCE, NO ROCKET SCIENCE HOWEVER THE FOLLOWING MAY HELP REDUCE THE EXTENT: ADEQUATE VIT E INTAKE REDUCING INFLAMMATORY FOODS ADEQUATE REST
